original_text: We remained there for many days. By then it had become dangerous to continue the journey. It was already after the Day of Atonement.
korean_text: 여러 날이 걸려 금식하는 절기가 이미 지났으므로 항해하기가 위태한지라 바울이 그들을 권하여

sentences.original_text: We remained there for many days
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 거기에서 많은 날 동안 머물렀습니다

sentences.original_text: By then it had become dangerous
It was already after the Day of Atonement
